item.description:
Have a great party before starting the Memorial Day weekend.  Beer, a vist by  Captian Morgan,  BBQ and the Red Sox will have just beaten the Tigers. 

McCormick and Schmick's in Faneuil Hall is teaming with Harpoon Brewery to celebrate with their "Open The Summer Patio Party" on Thursday, May 26th, from 5:00pm to 9:00pm. (Weather Permitting) This is one of Boston's best patios to see and be seen.

Harpoon will be pouring IPAs and UFOs.

There will be a complimentary buffet starting at 6:00 pm, while supplies last.

Live music featuring Endless Summer

A raffle to win a bunch of Harpoon prizes.

Admission is $10.00 at the door (includes a beer token for one IPA or UFO).

Show your Friend of Harpoon card and you get another token. Additional Beer tokens are $5.00.

And Don't forget those who this weekend is meant for-Those who served so we could enjoy parties like this.

 

This is a 21 plus eve
item.how_to_find_us: How to find us: At A Patio Table after 5PM
item.why: Perfect way to kick off the Summer
item.name: McCormick and Schmick's Annual Summer Kick Off Patio Party
